summary: A teenager (Moore), disillusioned by too many examples of love gone wrong, refuses to believe that true love exists. Then this new guy (Ford) comes along...
cast: Mandy Moore|Allison Janney|Trent Ford|Alexandra Holden|Dylan Baker|Nina Foch|Mackenzie Astin|Connie Ray|Mary Catherine Garrison|Sonja Smits|Laura Catalano|Ray Kahnert|Andrew Gillies|John White|Alison MacLeod|Bill Lake|Charlotte Sullivan|Philip Akin|Claire Crawford|Ennis Esmer|Thomas Hauff|Darryl Pring|Patrice Goodman|Audrey Gardiner|Jayne Eastwood|Judi Croon|Sandi Ross|Gabrielle Ashry|Dana Reznik|Darrin Brown|Darrell Hicks|Jon Hyatt|François Klanfer|Sharlene Yuen|Jeff White|Peter Gallagher|Inna Korobkina
title: Enamórate
